verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> a <S%H7613>rising,<s%> a <S%H5597>scab,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> and it <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> like the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy;<s%> then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> the priests: <S%H3548><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> and when the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the <S%H5061>plague<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in <S%H4758>sight<s%> be <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than the <S%H4480>skin<s%> <S%H5785><s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> him, and pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and in <S%H4758>sight<s%> be <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall shut <S%H5462>up<s%> him that <S%H853>hath<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%> be at a <S%H5975>stay,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall shut him <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> more: <S%H8145><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> him <S%H8145>again<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be somewhat <S%H3544>dark,<s%> and the <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is but a <S%H4556>scab:<s%> and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H4556>scab<s%> spread much <S%H6581>abroad<s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> after <S%H310>that<s%> he hath been <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for his <S%H2893>cleansing,<s%> he shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> again: <S%H8145><s%>

And if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4556>scab<s%> <S%H6581>spreadeth<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> in a <S%H120>man,<s%> then he shall be <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H7613>rising<s%> be <S%H3836>white<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> have <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and there be <S%H4241>quick<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H7613>rising;<s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> is an <S%H3462>old<s%> <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> shut him <S%H5462>up:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> break out <S%H6524>abroad<s%> <S%H6524><s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of him that hath the <S%H5061>plague<s%> from his <S%H4480>head<s%> <S%H7218><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> his <S%H7272>foot,<s%> <S%H3605>wheresoever<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4758>looketh;<s%> <S%H5869><s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>consider:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> have <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> he shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that <S%H853>hath<s%> the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> it is <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
But <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7200>appeareth<s%> in him, he shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and pronounce him to be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> for the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H2416>raw<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> turn <S%H7725>again,<s%> and be <S%H2015>changed<s%> unto <S%H3836>white,<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5061>plague<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3836>white;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean<s%> that <S%H853>hath<s%> the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
The <S%H1320>flesh<s%> also, in which, even in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> thereof, <S%H3588>was<s%> <S%H1961><s%> a <S%H7822>boil,<s%> and is <S%H7495>healed,<s%>

And in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil<s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H7613>rising,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and somewhat <S%H125>reddish,<s%> and it be <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And if, when the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> it, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> thereof be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> broken <S%H6524>out<s%> of the <S%H7822>boil.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> look <S%H7200>on<s%> it, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H8181>hairs<s%> therein, and if it be <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but be somewhat <S%H3544>dark;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall shut him <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it spread much <S%H6581>abroad<s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H5061>plague.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> and <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H6867>burning<s%> <S%H7822>boil;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> any <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> whereof there is a <S%H784>hot<s%> <S%H4348>burning,<s%> and the <S%H4241>quick<s%> flesh that <S%H4348>burneth<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3836>white<s%> bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> somewhat <S%H125>reddish,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>upon<s%> it: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> be <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> broken <S%H6524>out<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning:<s%> wherefore the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> look <S%H7200>on<s%> it, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in the bright <S%H934>spot,<s%> and it be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8217>lower<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the other <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but be somewhat <S%H3544>dark;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall shut him <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>upon<s%> him the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> it be spread much <S%H6581>abroad<s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the bright <S%H934>spot<s%> <S%H5975>stay<s%> in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> and <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> but <S%H1931>it<s%> be somewhat <S%H3544>dark;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H7613>rising<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is an <S%H6867>inflammation<s%> of the <S%H4348>burning.<s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H5061>plague<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H2206>beard;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if it be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> and there be in it a <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H8181>hair;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a dry <S%H5424>scurf,<s%> even a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> look <S%H7200>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scurf,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it be <S%H369>not<s%> in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and that there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> in it; then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall shut <S%H5462>up<s%> him that <S%H853>hath<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5061>plague:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> and there <S%H1961>be<s%> in it <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair,<s%> and the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> be <S%H369>not<s%> in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%>

He shall be <S%H1548>shaven,<s%> but the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1548>shave;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall shut <S%H5462>up<s%> him that <S%H853>hath<s%> the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> more: <S%H8145><s%>

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5424>scurf:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> be in <S%H4758>sight<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean:<s%> <S%H853><s%> and he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> spread <S%H6581>much<s%> <S%H6581><s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H2893>cleansing;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall look <S%H7200>on<s%> him: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> be <S%H6581>spread<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1239>seek<s%> for <S%H6669>yellow<s%> <S%H8181>hair;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> be in his <S%H5869>sight<s%> at a <S%H5975>stay,<s%> and that there is <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H8181>hair<s%> grown <S%H6779>up<s%> therein; the <S%H5424>scurf<s%> is <S%H7495>healed,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2889>clean:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall pronounce him <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> bright <S%H934>spots,<s%> even <S%H3836>white<s%> bright <S%H934>spots;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7200>look:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the bright <S%H934>spots<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be <S%H3544>darkish<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a freckled <S%H933>spot<s%> that <S%H6524>groweth<s%> in the <S%H5785>skin;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2889>clean.<s%>
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3588>whose<s%> hair is fallen <S%H4803>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H7142>bald;<s%> yet is <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And he that hath his hair fallen <S%H4803>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>part<s%> <S%H6285><s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> toward his <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is forehead <S%H1371>bald:<s%> yet is <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> in the bald <S%H7146>head,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> bald <S%H1372>forehead,<s%> a <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H125>reddish<s%> <S%H5061>sore;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> sprung <S%H6524>up<s%> in his bald <S%H7146>head,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his bald <S%H1372>forehead.<s%>
